name: Dictators: No Peace
description:
Dictators : No Peace is a war simulation and dictator game.

If you like simulation games, you will love playing Dictators : No Peace.

Play as a dictator of your favourite country and colonise the world.

Start ruling the world :
Increase your gold reserves by upgrading your production activities.
Also increase your gold reserves by trading goods.
Use the gold reserves to upgrade your military and then Colonize.

Become the greatest President of your country and the greatest dictator of all time.

Have fun playing Dictators : No Peace.

My YouTube channel :
https://youtu.be/qcMLEAEWkVg

Twitter : @IndieRpn

Added translations, so the game now supports the following languages : English,Russian,Chinese,Japanese,Korean,Portuguese,Spanish,German,French and Italian.
